channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: These Lesser Known AI Stocks Are Reaching Record Highs
item.description: After a decade of modest gains, data storage companies like Sandisk, Seagate and Western Digital had a stunning run in 2025.

item.title: ‘We do pranks and stuff like that’: Craigslist ad that sought 20 child actors for Minnesota daycare centers taken down after fueling fake news
item.description: Screenshots of the ad were used in social media posts on multiple platforms, cited as proof of fraud at Minnesota day care centers.

item.title: Minnesota fraud scandal gives Trump cover to withhold funding for kids in 5 Democratic-led states
item.description: Five states — California, Colorado, Illinois, Minnesota and New York — are targeted, and the HHS said they had been notified.

item.title: New Amazon Attacks Have Started—Do Not ‘Update Your Account’
item.description: If you see any of these messages, your account is under attack. Here's what you need to do.

item.title: Exclusive: Fireblocks acquires crypto accounting platform TRES Finance for $130 million
item.description: This is the crypto infrastructure firm’s second acquisition over the past year.

item.title: Russian Media Praise Cavalry Annihilated By Ukrainian Drones
item.description: There are now recorded instances of Russian cavalry in action, Russian media try to spin mounted assault as as tactical ingenuity, but charges end in ...

item.title: 6 Reasons Doctors Are Burning Out And How That Threatens Your Healthcare
item.description: From “pajama time” spent responding to patient messages to debates over internet misinformation, here is why your doctor is exhausted and how it impac...

item.title: Private sector added fewer-than-expected 41,000 jobs in December, ADP says
item.description: The figure reported on Wednesday is below economists’ estimates of an increase of 47,000 jobs and higher than the prior month’s revised reading of a l...

item.title: New vehicle sales to decline moderately in 2026 as affordability issues weigh, forecast says
item.description: Cox Automotive forecasts U.S. vehicle sales will decline 2.4% to 15.8 million units in 2026, with fleet sales dropping 6.1% as auto market slows.

item.title: ‘Largest LBO in history’: Warner rejects Paramount again, scoffing at $87 billion worth of debt in its $108 billion bid
item.description: Warner continues to stick with Netflix, the shock winner that emerged in early December from the auction begun by Paramount.

item.title: Cancer Breakthrough: Reprogramming Tumor Immune Cells Directly
item.description: A new mRNA-based method reprograms immune cells directly inside solid tumors, boosting anti-cancer activity and paving the way for next-generation the...

item.title: Dallas mayor predicts 'avalanche' of NYC financial firms fleeing new socialist policies under Mamdani
item.description: Dallas Mayor Eric Johnson predicts financial firms will flee New York City for Texas as the Big Apple's new mayor pursues socialist policies.

item.title: The Education Department is garnishing wages for millions of student loan borrowers in default. Who is affected and how much they can take
item.description: Wage garnishment "is a scary concept since they can take 15% of after-tax income," Ashley Morgan, debt and bankruptcy attorney and owner of Ashley F. ...

item.title: Services sector of U.S. economy perked up in December, ISM data indicate
The U.S. economy is barely generating more jobs than are being destroyed
Supreme Court could rule on Trump’s tariffs as soon as Friday
Warner Bros., unswayed by Ellison backing of Paramount bid, sticks with Netflix
An ounce of gold hasn’t bought so many barrels of oil since the pandemic panic
Defense spending could rise following US arrest of Venezuela's Maduro, analyst says
item.description: The Trump administration's arrest of Venezuelan leader Nicolás Maduro could lead to an increase in defense spending as the White House looks to counte...

item.title: Iconic children's toy brand goes high-tech to bring creations 'to life' without screens
item.description: LEGO introduces revolutionary screen-free SMART Play technology at CES 2026, bringing interactive sounds and lights to physical builds.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
